Interface CrewMemberRemover

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbandonedShip, SlaveTraders, WarField
public interface CrewMemberRemover

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    removeMemberProcess(List<Cabin> chosenCabins, int crewMalus)
    Removes crew members from the specified cabins while ensuring there are enough crew members in each cabin to allow the operation.

  • Method Details

    • removeMemberProcess

      default void removeMemberProcess(List<Cabin> chosenCabins, int crewMalus) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes crew members from the specified cabins while ensuring there are enough crew members in each cabin to allow the operation. If the removal count for any cabin exceeds its inhabitants, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      chosenCabins - the list of cabins from which crew members will be removed
      crewMalus - an integer representing a penalty or additional constraint applied during the process
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the required number of crew members in a cabin is insufficient
